summary: AFTER STOPPING AT A RED LIGHT DURING A RAIN STORM.  I ATTEMPTED TO PULL OUT AFTER THE LIGHT TURNED GREEN THE MOTOR DIED.  I STARTED THE CAR RIGHT BACK UP.  THE NEXT DAY MY BELT STARTED SQUEAKING.  I HAVE AN APPOINTMENT FOR SERVICE.  ALSO, DURING THE FIRST 10 DAYS OF BUYING THE CAR THE THROW OUT BEARING HAD TO BE REPLACED.
